thread.title: Shah Rukh, Amitabh in race for world's 'worst dancer' tag
thread.title_full: Shah Rukh, Amitabh in race for world's 'worst dancer' tag

title: Shah Rukh, Amitabh in race for world's 'worst dancer' tag
text: You are here: Home » Entertainment » Shah Rukh, Amitabh in race for world's 'worst dancer' tag Shah Rukh, Amitabh in race for world's 'worst dancer' tag Oct 15, 2015, Agencies: While shooting for Rohit Shetty's "Dilwale" in Hyderabad, superstar Shah Rukh Khan made an "honest confession" that he and his co-star Kajol are world's "worst best dancers". "There's nothing I like more than working. A dancing night with Kajol even better. We are the worst best dancers in the world!!! Honest confession," Shah Rukh tweeted.But, Amitabh Bachchan doesn't agree with Shah Rukh. Replying to SRK's tweet, Big B tweeted: “@iamsrk WRONG .. !! You both are the best best .. I AM THE WORST WORST !! Been dancing all night too and have proved myself right !! HUUHAA”To this, Shah Rukh replied, “@SrBachchan Sir sorry, Chota muh badi baat but I will beat u at bad dancing. I am a natural interpretive dancer & my form is called Disaster.” With PTI outputs
